birthdayConfirmPurge.title: Clear User Data
birthdayConfirmPurge.description: This command will remove both your time zone and your birthday from the database. [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.whyDoesItNeedMyTimezone}})

defaultTimeZoneAvailable.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: This server has a default timezone of **{{SERVER_TIMEZONE}}**. Do you want to use the server's timezone?

defaultTimeZoneAvailableOverride.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: This server has a default timezone of **{{SERVER_TIMEZONE}}**. Do you want to use **{{INPUTTED_TIMEZONE}}** instead?
Clicking {{COM:emotes.confirm}} will set your timezone to **{{INPUTTED_TIMEZONE}}**
Clicking {{COM:emotes.deny}} will set your timezone **{{SERVER_TIMEZONE}}**

birthdaySetupTimeZone.title: Time Zone Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: First, please type/paste your time zone below. [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.whyDoesItNeedMyTimezone}})
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{COM:links.map}})!
Simply click your location on the map and copy the name of the selected time zone.
**Example Usage:** `America/New_York`
**Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.

birthdaySetupBirthday.title: Birthday Setup - {{TARGET}}
description: Please type your birth month and day below. [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.whyDoesItNeedOnlyMonthAndDate}})
**Example Usage:** `{{DATE_EXAMPLE}}` ({{DATE_FORMAT}})
**Important**: By submitting this information you agree it can be shown to anyone.

confirmBirthday.description: {{TARGET}}, please confirm this information is correct: **{{BIRTHDAY}}, {{TIMEZONE}}**

birthdayChannel.title: Server Setup - Birthday Channel
description: For help, view the required setup guide [here]({{COM:docLinks.setupRequiredGuide}})!
To begin you must set up the birthday channel [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.whatIsBirthdayChannel}})
Please select an option

birthdayRole.title: Server Setup - Birthday Role
description: Now, set up the birthday role [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.whatIsBirthdayRole}})
Note: The Birthday Role is actively removed from those whose birthday it isn't.
Please select an option

inputChannel.description: Please mention a channel or input a channel's name.

inputRole.description: Please mention a role or input a role's name.

nameFormat.title: Configure the Name Format Setting
description: Please type/paste the name format setting you would like. [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.whatIsNameFormat}})
*Besides each option is how {{COM:bot.name}} will show names with that setting.*
**Options**:
`Mention` - {{MENTION}}
`Username` - {{USERNAME}}
`Nickname` - {{NICKNAME}}
`Tag` - {{TAG}}

timezone.title: Configure the Server Timezone Setting
description: Please type/paste the timezone you would like. [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.defaultTimeZone}})
To find your time zone please use the [map time zone picker]({{COM:links.map}})!
Simply click your location on the map and copy the name of the selected time zone.
**Example Usage:** `America/New_York`

useTimezone.title: Configure the Use Timezone Setting
description: Please type/paste the use timezone setting you would like. [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.whatIsUseTimezone}})
This decides whether or not {{COM:bot.name}} will use the server's timezone or the user's timezone.
**Options**:
`User`
`Server`

dateFormat.title: Configure the Date Format Setting
description: Please type/paste the date format setting you would like. [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.whatIsDateFormat}})
This determines how {{COM:bot.name}} will detect dates in your discord.
**Example Usage:** `month/day` or `day/month`

trustedPreventsMessage.title: Configure the Trusted Prevents Message Setting
description: Should the trusted role prevent the birthday message? [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.trustedPreventsMessage)
True: {{COM:emotes.confirm}}
False: {{COM:emotes.deny}}

trustedPreventsRole.title: Configure the Trusted Prevents Message Role
description: Should the trusted role prevent the birthday role? [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.trustedPreventsRole}})
True: {{COM:emotes.confirm}}
False: {{COM:emotes.deny}}

trustedRequireAll.title: Configure the Require All Trusted Roles Setting
description: With **{{COM:bot.name}} premium** you can set multiple trusted roles. Because of this, you can choose if a user needs one or all of the trusted roles to have their birthday celebrated.
Should birthdays require all trusted roles? [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.requireAllTrustedRoles}})
True: {{COM:emotes.confirm}}
False: {{COM:emotes.deny}}

channelType.title: Channel Type
description: Which type of channel are you setting?
Please enter one of the options listed below:
`Birthday` - Where birthday messages will be sent.
`Member Anniversary` - Where member anniversary messages will be sent.
`Server Anniversary` - Where server anniversary messages will be sent.

channel.title: Configure the {{TYPE}} Channel
description: This setting will decide where the {{TYPE_LOWERCASE}} messages will be sent. [(?)]({{DOC_LINK}})
Please select an option

role.title: Configure the {{TYPE}} Role
description: This sets up one of the roles {{COM:bot.name}} uses. [(?)]({{DOC_LINK}})
Please select an option

blacklist.description: Are you sure you want to clear __**{{TOTAL}}**__ blacklisted user(s)/role(s)?

trustedRole.description: Are you sure you want to clear __**{{TOTAL}}**__ trusted role(s)?

mar.description: Are you sure you want to clear __**{{TOTAL}}**__ member anniversary role(s)?

customMessage.description: Are you sure you want to clear __**{{MESSAGE_COUNT}}**__ {{DISPLAY_TYPE}}?

colorSelection.title: Custom Message Color Selection
description: Please input the color you would like your message. [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.whatIsMessageEmbedColor}})
Both color names and hex values are accepted.

embedSelection.title: Custom Message - Embedded
description: Should this message be embedded? [(?)]({{COM:docLinks.whatIsAnEmbed}})
Hint: This message is embed! Non-embedded messages are just plain text.
True {{COM:emotes.confirm}}
False {{COM:emotes.deny}}
